title: Angular CLI Config Schema

___warnings.description: Allow people to disable console warnings.

___nodeDeprecation.description: Show a warning when the node version is incompatible.

___packageDeprecation.description: Show a warning when the user installed angular-cli.

___versionMismatch.description: Show a warning when the global version is newer than the local one.

___apps.description: Properties of the different applications in this project.

___environments.description: Name and corresponding file for environment config.

___scripts.description: Global scripts to be included in the build.

___styles.description: Global styles to be included in the build.

___stylePreprocessorOptions.description: Options to pass to style preprocessors

___includePaths.description: Paths to include. Paths will be resolved to project root.

___packages.description: Configuration reserved for installed third party packages.

___addons.description: Configuration reserved for installed third party addons.

___serve.description: Properties to be passed to the serve command

___port.description: The port the application will be served on

___host.description: The host the application will be served on

___lint.description: Properties to be passed to TSLint.

___project.description: The global configuration of the project.
